name: inventor_sequence
description: order in which the inventor appears in patent file; sequence for this table begins at {0}.

name: inventor_id
description: unique inventor id generated by the disambiguation algorithm

name: gender_code
description: inventor attributed gender (F = female, M = male, U = no gender attributed)

name: location_id
description: inventor's location. If the inventor's sequence number is 0, then his/her location is the "location" of the related patent
